Package extra

Class Client

java.lang.Object
extra.Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.jms.MessageListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientType1, ClientType2, ClientType3
public abstract class Client
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.jms.MessageListener
A class which represents a client. It's an abstract class because there will be some different clients who will have different interest in buying actions. There are 2 methods that will have every single client. This methods are buyShare and printWallet. The other one method is abstract because each client will have a different interest of share, so it will be implemented in the different classes of clients.
Author:
Aaron Cabero Blanco, Gonzalo PeÃ±a RupÃ©rez, Xiao Peng Ye, Daniel Tomas Sanchez

      protected void buyShare​(java.lang.String ticker, int share, float price)
      It makes the action of a purchase on behalf of the client.
      Parameters:
      ticker - The identifying of the shares enterprise.
      share - The number of shares the client is going to buy.
      price - The price of a single share.
